column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Today , I had to ride the bus home from the market .
#id=2
#text=I walked over to the bus stop to wait for the next bus .
#id=3
#text=It was supposed to arrive in 10 minutes .
#id=4
#text=When the bus pulled up to the bus stop where I was waiting , I stood up and walked over to curb .
#id=5
#text=The bus driver opened the bus doors and I stepped up into the bus .
#id=6
#text=I had to hand my money to the bus driver so that I could ride .
#id=7
#text=Once the driver took my money , I walked down the aisle to find a seat .
#id=8
#text=There were many seats available so I picked one beside an older lady that looked like my grandmother .
#id=9
#text=She was very nice and talked to me while we rode down the street .
#text=Once the bus stopped down the street from my house , I got off and walked down the sidewalk to my house .
#text=I was very glad to be home .
